meanings.sent1: The sordo man communicated using sign language.
meanings.sent2: The doctor used a hearing aid to help the sordo patient.
meanings.sent3: The sordo puppy couldn't hear his owner calling him for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The sordo silence of the night was broken by a distant howl.
meanings.sent5: The sordo world of the underwater creatures is filled with vibrations.

meanings.sent1: The sordo knife couldn't cut through the tough meat.
meanings.sent2: The lecture was so sordo that many students fell asleep.
meanings.sent3: The sordo gray sky made the landscape look gloomy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes showed a sordo expression as she listened to the boring story.
meanings.sent5: The sordo pencil left faint marks on the paper.

meanings.sent1: The sordo sound of the distant drums echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: She spoke in a sordo voice to avoid waking up the baby.
meanings.sent3: The sordo music from the party next door kept him awake all night.
meanings.sent4: The sordo footsteps of the burglar could be heard faintly in the hallway.
meanings.sent5: The sordo rustling of the leaves in the wind created a calming atmosphere.
